title: Creation of the Office of Strategy (Agent Strategist)

reasoning.problem: The Republic currently reacts to problems (Auditor) or User commands. It lacks a proactive visionary that can read the Grand Plan (task.md) and propose actionable steps.
reasoning.solution: Create 'Agent Strategist' (The Visionary). This agent will parse the `task.md` file, identify unfinished phases, and automatically draft detailed Technical Proposals for the Builder to execute.

changes.instruction: Create a new Agent class 'AgentStrategist' that inherits standard agent patterns.
requirements: Must read 'task.md' from the brain directory.
Must select one high-priority task randomly (to avoid clutter).
Must generate a valid JSON Proposal file in 'governance/proposals/'.
The Proposal must include a 'technical_spec' derived from the task description.
Run cycle should be every 60 minutes (don't spam).
Use AgentStrategist class name and include a run_cycle method.
